messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR GARY RIDLEY
messages.content: Protecting the NHS, Helping Pensioners, A New Technical Academy for Coventry

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Coventry’s residents deserve a world class health service. Conservatives will protect the National Health Service, with budget cuts Gary will also continue to campaign against hospital car parking charges.
Pensioners have been hard hit by the recession. Gary supports Conservative plans to raise the basic state pension inline with earnings.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A New Technical Academy for Coventry
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives will create twelve new technical academies. Gary will campaign for Coventry to benefit. Gary supports Conservative plans to create 400,000 new apprenticeships and pre-apprenticeship and college places.

issues.education: As a former student of Coventry University, Gary believes that the city is key to helping people back to work after the recession. He hopes we will create over 100,000 university places.
issues.health: Coventry’s residents deserve a world class health service. Conservatives will protect the National Health Service, with budget cuts Gary will also continue to campaign against hospital car parking charges.

images.caption: Gary meeting with members of the public.
Gary working to support jobs and business.
Gary at the location of a development that will create skilled jobs.
Gary standing up for higher education.
Gary campaigning for the Ricoh Arena.
Gary unveiling a statue of Lady Godiva.
